sources.name: Parquet1
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~>  Parquet1

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Parquet1 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.DataLakeContents("https://tolga123.dfs.core.windows.net/tolgadeneme/outputtest/dataflowdeneme"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc)
in
  Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Parquet1,
  #"Renamed columns" = Table.RenameColumns(Source, {{"LastName", "surname1"}}),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Renamed columns", "namesurname", each [FirstName] + [surname1]),
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Added custom", {"namesurname"})
in
  #"Removed columns";
